context: Healthcare system implementing population-level genomic screening for preventive care and personalized medicine

request.purpose: Establish population genomics screening program with sequencing infrastructure and clinical integration
request.justification: Preventive identification of genetic risks could reduce long-term healthcare costs by 20% and improve patient outcomes

decision_process.outcome: Strong clinical evidence for preventive screening in high-risk populations
Comprehensive ethical and legal framework ensuring patient rights and data protection
Scalable infrastructure with automated analysis and clinical decision support
Positive ROI within 5 years with significant preventive care savings

business_impact.projected_revenue: $100 million in cost savings from preventive care over 10 years
